subject: Updating/maintaining on NHAI website the lists of (i) Debarred/blacklisted Concessionaires/Contractors; Consultants & Individuals; and (ii) Contracts terminated by NHAI for defaults of Concessionaires/ Contractors/Consultants.

Para- 2(iii) (b) of Minutes) Sub: Updating/maintaining on NHAI website the lists of Debarred/blacklisted Concessionaires/Contractors, Consultants & Individuals; and (ii) Contracts terminated by NHAI for defaults of concessionaires/ Contractors/Consultants. Refer Policy circular dated 22.12.2017 (copy enclosed at Annex-A) and note dated 05.03.2018 of then Member (A/F) (Copy enclosed at Annex-B). It is observed that Project Monitoring Division (PMD) is not getting the reports/details promptly. This matter came up for discussion during the meeting of Executive Committee (EC) held on 13.03.2019 and EC decided that the concerned Technical Division/RO would be held responsible, if they had not provided the details promptly. Therefore, all Tech: Divisions/ ROs are to notice that should look into their records and furnish the details as prescribed in Policy Guidelines dated 22.12.2017 to PMD (at email pmd@nhai org) without any further delay. These instructions should be followed strictly for future cases also as mentioned in Para-(iv) of Policy Guidelines dated 22.12.2017. Encl: As above 0 3/49 (V.K. Sharma) CGM (Coord& Parl.)
